title: XiaoWeiXiao sospeso, eloboosting etc.
body:
Cosa ne pensate? Qualche fonte:

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3e40r5/potential_rumor_about_xiaoweixiao_elo_boosting/

https://twitter.com/RiotHebble/status/623951720268214272

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3e8o89/xiaoweixiao_is_suspended_pending_investigation/

ggwp.

replies.body:
... saper leggere ... (o saper scrivere ...)
Lui **HA** boostato un altro per soldi.

Calma, ho copiato una parte che non dovevo copiare (legata al link), sistemato.
Fa caldo eh...

Hi, I’m TiP XiaoWeiXiao, I feel very sorry to everyone. Because of my ignorance, I did not realize ELO boosting is a such severe incident, so it happened.  I assure you guys, this was the first time and last time I would ever do such thing. I sincerely apologize to all of our fans, Riot Games, and mostly my teammates. Sorry, I didn't live up to your expectations.
L'eloboosting è come il doping nel ciclismo, lo fanno tutti ma ne beccano pochi.
